SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.view

Class ScoreTileView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.view.ScoreTileView
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ScoreTileView extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents the ScoreTile's view. The class contains a series of getters to access their personal goals, their goal tiles, their Bookshelfs, chats and a series of other class related relevant informations.
